author: cms-sw
body: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/9218 broke the multi-arch builds. Though all the externals were built for default and extra micro-arch but multi-arch flags were disabled for cmssw due to missing vectorized_packages.txt file in `cmssw-tool-conf`. This PR properly copies `vectorized_packages.txt` from `cmssw-tools` in to `cmssw-tool-conf`
title: Fix for multi-arch: copy vectorized_packages.txt in to tool-conf
